name: ffmpegu
description: Simple ffmpeg library for JavaScript backend runtimes with direct access to ffmpeg binary functionality
author: ilchishin.denis@gmail.com

scripts.version:git: git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore: release v$npm_package_version' || echo 'No changes to commit' && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: $npm_execpath run prepublish && $npm_execpath version minor --no-git-tag-version && $npm_execpath run version:git
scripts.version:major: $npm_execpath run prepublish && $npm_execpath version major --no-git-tag-version && $npm_execpath run version:git
scripts.version:patch: $npm_execpath run prepublish && $npm_execpath version patch --no-git-tag-version && $npm_execpath run version:git
